news.title: Blackrock Clinic co-founder and wife file for bankruptcy with debts of €14.5m
news.summary: A co-founder of the Blackrock Clinic private hospital and his wife have filed for bankruptcy, listing debts of around €14.5m.

news.title: ‘They still expect him to arrive in the driveway’ – terrible sense of shock as families grieve five dead in Dundalk crash
news.summary: The parents of one of the five young people killed in a two-vehicle crash in Co Louth on Saturday night still expect their son to arrive home, their parish priest has said.

news.title: ‘There are no paedophiles in heaven,’ victim tells Pat Salmon (89) as he is sentenced for horrific abuse of young girl
news.summary: Moments before the paedophile Pat Salmon learnt his fate for the horrific abuse of a five-year-old, he complained to his counsel about having had to sleep on the floor of his overcrowded cell the night before.

news.title: Gary Breen: Troy Parrott’s exceptional quality has allowed Irish squad to earn deserved acclaim
news.summary: My phone has been hopping since Sunday. There’s been a steady stream of messages from my friends in England and they’re all pretty much saying the same thing

news.title: A teacher, a student, a farmer, a plumber and a salesman: The five young crash victims whose lives were cut short in one tragic night
news.summary: The five young friends killed in the Louth road tragedy were embarking on a variety of paths in their lives.

news.title: HSE facing bill of more than €720m for agency workers as thousands of staff jobs remain unfilled
news.summary: The HSE is on course to spend more than €720m hiring agency workers this year while not filling more than 3,700 staff jobs for which it has funding.

news.title: ‘It’s worth over €300,000 if you receive the full state pension and live to the age of 85’ – meet the Irish people who cashed in on the UK state pension windfall
news.summary: Like generations of Irish workers before him, Seamus Doyle found himself working in the sprawling Ford Motor Company plant in Dagenham in the 1980s. He’d been recruited by an Irishman as an industrial painter, and painted the roofs, floors and offices of what was then Europe’s biggest car factory.

news.title: Kirsty Blake Knox: Why Adam Peaty and Holly Ramsay’s wedding drama is the latest celebrity family feud we can't get enough of
news.summary: Ordinarily, details of the upcoming wedding of a gold medal Olympian swimmer and a popular influencer, whose dad is a mega-celebrity chef, would have filled social columns.

news.title: ‘Do I lose my claim on the house and farm if I move out and my husband stays?’
news.summary: Query:   I’m writing because I feel utterly lost and unsure of what to do. My husband and I own a small farm together.

news.title: One thing I’ve learned is that grief is not a straight line. Grief is hugely personal and individual to every person
news.summary: Caroline O’Connell says she literally screamed. “It was like my world collapsed.” “Grief is not a straight line. It isn’t the old-style interpretation of, you go through the stages and expect it to be a nice, neat journey, and you’re able to cope and process everything”
